channel.title: Templates on Mark Needham
channel.description: Recent content in Templates on Mark Needham

item.title: Resharper templates
item.description: One of the first things that I do when I go onto a project is setup a ReSharper template for writing tests. I generally set this up so that when I type ‘should’ I can press tab and it will automatically create an outline of a test method for me. Creating a template is as simple as going to ‘ReSharper > Live Templates’ from Visual Studio. I have attached several templates that I seem to end up writing over and over again.
